skills.desc: Has a 75% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs and a 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Savant's Savvy
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Increases the duration of all [Poison] debuffs and [HP Burn] debuffs on all enemies by 1 turn. Then, instantly activates any [Poison] debuffs and [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy. 

Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns on enemies not under [Poison] debuffs or [HP Burn] debuffs.
skills.name: Chymistry
